snippet: United Technologies, one of the world's largest makers of aircraft engines, announced on Tuesday that it would seek to raise $1 billion to help finance its $16.5 billion takeover of the Goodrich Corporation.
abstract: United Technologies, one of the world's largest makers of aircraft engines, announced on Tuesday that it would seek to raise $1 billion to help finance its $16.5 billion takeover of the Goodrich Corporation.

headline.main: United Technologies to Raise $1 Billion for Goodrich Takeover
